description:
Ibuki comes back to the rugby club, but the third year students don`t want to accept him. Natsusa suggests a solution. Everyone tests Ibuki`s skills in rugby with a intraclub match to decide if he is useless or not. A seven-month blank is hard.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Hiroi Ie ni Hikkoshitemo Betsu ni Katazukanai... Nimotsu Fueru dake
I Moved into a Big House, but Can`t Get It All Put Away... Things Keep Piling Up.
広い家に引っ越しても別に片付かない... 荷物増えるだけ
